display_name: Total number of reliable days with sleep data recorded from actigraphy
description: This is the number of main rest intervals for which the sum of the quality score for in bed and out of bed times is 5 or 6. Bed times are given a reliability score between 1 and 3:  -8 = Not Applicable, -1 = Flag/ Confusion, 0 = No Evidence of Sleep, 1 = Unreliable, 2 = Somewhat reliable, 3 = Mostly reliable
